**Module:** `Cisco-IOS-XE-netconf-diag-rpc`
**Version:** 2022-11-01
**Operations:** 1

**📊 YANG Tree:** [View Cisco-IOS-XE-netconf-diag-rpc structure](https://jeremycohoe.github.io/cisco-ios-xe-openapi-swagger/yang-trees/Cisco-IOS-XE-netconf-diag-rpc.html)

post.summary:
Enable NETCONF Message Diagnostics for providing
       easy access to all information required to diagnose
       NETCONF transaction failures on NED models.
post.description:
Enable NETCONF Message Diagnostics for providing
       easy access to all information required to diagnose
       NETCONF transaction failures on NED models.

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/netconf_diag_rpc:enable-netconf-diag`
